item.title: 美国防鼠垃圾桶制造商如何被特朗普的关税所困
item.description:
小企业正在认识到，贸易战中没有避风港。【原文：

Small businesses are learning there are no safe havens in the trade wars.

】

item.title: 模拟人生》25 年的霸主地位受到韩国《Krafton》的挑战
item.description:
inZOI 是一款全新的生活模拟视频游戏， 更加逼真，更具多元文化特色 

。【原文：

inZOI, a new life-simulation video game, gets more realistic and more multicultural 

】

item.title: 印度尼西亚银行免去国家银行专员职务
item.description: 印尼银行已于本周解除了三名被任命为国有银行专员的官员的职务。【原文：Bank Indonesia has honorably dismissed three officials who were appointed as commissioners at state-owned banks this week.】

item.title: 关税担忧席卷而来 对冲基金抢购周期股
item.description: 对冲基金已开始抢购经济敏感型公司的股票，这些公司的股票在过去一个月里因经济衰退的忧虑冲击美国股市而大幅下跌。【原文：Hedge funds have started to snap up the shares of economically sensitive companies that had cratered over the past month as recession worries rocked US stock markets.】

item.title: 新世界寻求 20 亿美元贷款，抵押香港的珍贵资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由于流动性压力持续上升，香港开发商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Hong Kong developer New World Development Co. has proposed using one of its most valuable assets, Victoria Dockside, as collateral for an additional loan of as much as HK$15.6 billion ($2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter, as liquidity pressure continues to mount.】

item.title: 泰国将赋予市场监管机构更多防止欺诈的权力
item.description: 在一系列企业丑闻打击了投资者信心之后，泰国出台了一项紧急法令，赋予其资本市场监管机构更多的监督和监管权力。【原文：Thailand has introduced an emergency decree to grant its capital markets regulator more power in its oversight and supervision after a series of corporate scandals rattled investor confidence.】

item.title: 挪威在通胀回升后推迟周期内首次降息
item.description: 挪威央行推迟了一项沟通已久的削减借贷成本的计划，直到今年晚些时候，因为挪威官员们要对通货膨胀的加剧做出反应。【原文：Norway’s central bank delayed a long-communicated cut in borrowing costs until later this year as officials responded to a flare-up in inflation.】

item.title: 中国 "不知道 "第三号军事官员被调查的报道
item.description: 中国国防部表示，"不知道 "关于中国第三号军事官员被拘留的报道，因为有传言称他因腐败问题被调查。【原文：China’s Defense Ministry said it was “unaware” of reports that the nation’s No. 3 military official had been detained, as rumors swirl he’s been placed under investigation for corruption.】

item.title: 赞比亚通胀率近两年来首次放缓
item.description: 赞比亚的年度通货膨胀率自 2023 年 6 月以来首次放缓，原因是降雨改善导致食品价格增长放缓。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation slowed for the first time since June 2023 as food price-growth eased on improved rains.】

item.title: 油气钻探产量增加，中国能建利润上升
item.description: 由于能源产出的增长抵消了价格的疲软，中国能建有限公司公布了更高的年度盈利。【原文：Cnooc Ltd. posted higher annual earnings, as growth in energy output offset weaker prices.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行警告短期再融资风险
item.description: 菲律宾央行警告企业避免过度依赖短期资金，以免在债务再融资时受到影响。【原文：The Philippine central bank warned companies to avoid an excessive reliance on short-term funding that could leave them vulnerable when refinancing debt.】

item.title: 欧洲 2025 年最大首次公开募股后，Asker 在斯德哥尔摩首次公开募股时一跃而起
item.description: 在今年迄今为止欧洲最大的首次公开募股活动中，Asker Healthcare Group AB 公司及其所有者筹集了近 89 亿克朗（约合 8.87 亿美元）的资金，该公司股价在斯德哥尔摩的首次公开募股活动中大涨。【原文：Asker Healthcare Group AB shares surged in their Stockholm debut after the company and its owners raised nearly 8.9 billion kronor ($887 million) in Europe’s largest initial public offering so far this year.】

item.title: 供暖需求逐渐减少，欧洲天然气价格保持稳定
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格在小幅涨跌之间摇摆不定，因为供暖季即将结束，交易商们正集中精力为明年冬季储备天然气。【原文：European natural gas prices swung between small gains and losses as the heating season draws to an end and traders focus on stockpiling for next winter.】

item.title: 特朗普关税初现端倪，中日韩将举行会谈
item.description: 据媒体报道，韩国和日本的高级贸易官员将于本周末在首尔与中国贸易官员会面，讨论经济合作问题，以寻求应对美国不断增加的贸易压力的方法。【原文：Top trade officials from South Korea and Japan are set to meet with their Chinese counterpart in Seoul this weekend to discuss economic cooperation as they seek ways to respond to increasing trade pressure from the US, according to a media report.】

item.title: 贝莱德的博文认为美国股市优于欧洲股市
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BlackRock Investment Institute）负责人让-博文（Jean Boivin）认为，美国股市将很快恢复其长期以来相对于欧洲股市的优势，因为旧大陆股市的光明前景仅限于国防和银行等行业。【原文：US equities will soon regain their long-held edge over European peers as the brighter outlook for the old continent’s stocks is limited to sectors such as defense and banks, according to Jean Boivin, head of the BlackRock Investment Institute.】

item.title: 布拉德-雅各布斯为何斥资 110 亿美元收购屋顶供应业务
item.description:
Beacon供应公司会成为他的下一个大赢家吗？【原文：

Will Beacon Supply be his next big winner?

】

item.title: 奇货可居：布拉德-雅各布斯为何要收购一家屋顶公司（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：布拉德-雅各布斯为何要收购一家屋顶公司（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Why Brad Jacobs Is Buying a Roofing Company (Podcast)】

item.title: 投资者选择债券，南非出现外国股票抛售现象
item.description: 2024 年第四季度，外国投资者以一年多来最快的速度抛售南非股票，因为他们大量投资于南非债券，导致投资组合流入量减少。【原文：Foreign investors sold off South African equities at the fastest pace in more than a year in the fourth quarter of 2024, as they piled into the nation’s bonds, leading to smaller portfolio inflows.】

item.title: 瑞银可汗称关税争端下的 "滞胀 "才是真正的风险
item.description: 瑞银集团亚太区总裁伊克巴尔-汗（Iqbal Khan）表示，投资者面临的真正风险是滞胀，因为他在不确定的市场中看到了 "机会洼地"。【原文：UBS Group AG’s Asia Pacific President Iqbal Khan said the real risk facing investors is stagflation as he sees “pockets of opportunity” amid uncertain markets.】

item.title: 在意大利的游说下，普京将俄罗斯部队归还给阿里斯顿
item.description: 在意大利政府的游说下，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京签署命令，取消了对阿里斯顿控股公司（Ariston Holding NV）当地部门的临时管理。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin signed an order to cancel the temporary management of Ariston Holding NV’s local unit following lobbying by the government in Italy.】

item.title: 日本细价股飙升，引发对未经授权交易的担忧
item.description: 日本便士股接连飙升，令人猜测这些股票的变动是由未经授权的交易引发的。【原文：A spate of spikes in Japan’s penny stocks is raising speculation the moves were triggered by unauthorized trades.】

item.title: Wunsch 告诉 CNBC，欧洲央行应考虑在四月暂停减息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员皮埃尔-温施（Pierre Wunsch）表示，由于美国贸易政策使欧洲中央银行的决策变得复杂，欧洲中央银行应考虑在下次会议上保持利率稳定。【原文：The European Central Bank should consider holding interest rates steady at its next meeting as US trade policy complicates its decision-making, according to Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch.】

item.title: Glencore 开普敦炼油厂呼吁控制燃料进口
item.description: Glencore Plc 旗下的 Astron Energy 呼吁南非加强对日益增长的燃料进口的监管，并采取措施保持其开普敦炼油厂的活力。【原文：Glencore Plc-owned Astron Energy is calling for South Africa to improve oversight of growing fuel imports along with measures to keep its Cape Town refinery viable.】

item.title: Meta亚太区首席执行官在经历长达十年的高速增长后辞职
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司将失去其亚太地区最高级别的业务主管，这位行业资深人士在长达十年的任期内，曾领导这家社交媒体公司开拓了一些最大的国际市场。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is losing its senior-most business executive for the Asia-Pacific, an industry veteran who shepherded some of the social media company’s largest international markets over a decade-long tenure.】

item.title: 剑桥联营公司将目光投向迪拜私人财富市场
item.description: 剑桥联营公司（Cambridge Associates）正在向迪拜扩张，与其他资金管理公司一样，希望开发迪拜深厚的私人财富池。【原文：Cambridge Associates is expanding to Dubai, joining other money managers who’ve looked to tap into the city’s deep pools of private wealth.】

item.title: 前高盛分析师的基金希望从日本赌注中获得 5500 万美元的意外之财
item.description: 有明资本（Ariake Capital）是由前高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Ariake Capital, a $320-million Japanese hedge fund founded by former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. analyst Katsunori Tanaka, is poised to make a profit of about $55 million from selling one of its major regional bank holdings.】

item.title: 特朗普新关税冲击汽车制造商股价，欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对美国进口汽车征收 25% 的关税后，欧洲股市下跌，再次引发了人们对其贸易政策将损害企业盈利和经济的担忧。【原文：European stocks fell after President Donald Trump imposed a 25% tariff on US auto imports, raising renewed concern that his trade policy will hurt corporate earnings and the economy.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑恢复上涨，股市有望下跌
韩国锌业在股东大会召开前赢得法院对顶级投资者的审判
item.description: 韩国一家法院裁定支持韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.）阻止其最大投资者在期待已久的年度股东大会上投票的努力，这对该公司首席执行官崔润八（Yun B. Choi）保持对这家金属巨头控制权的努力是一个推动。【原文：A South Korean court has ruled in favor of Korea Zinc Co.’s efforts to stop its largest investor from voting at a keenly awaited annual shareholder meeting, a boost for Chief Executive Yun B. Choi’s effort to retain control over the metals giant.】

item.title: 法国预算赤字比预期收窄
item.description: 法国 2024 年的预算赤字比预期的要少，这为政府在努力降低债务负担的同时提供了一些喘息的空间。【原文：France’s 2024 budget deficit was narrower than expected, giving the government some breathing room as it struggles to lower its debt load.】
